scripts.build: wp-scripts build && npm run sass && npm run js:copy && npm run copy-save
scripts.sass: npx sass src/proprietary-tools/style.scss:build/proprietary-tools/style.css --style=compressed && npx sass src/legacy/style.scss:build/legacy/style.css --style=compressed && npx sass src/comprehensive-benefits/style.scss:build/comprehensive-benefits/style.css --style=compressed
scripts.copy-css: cp src/proprietary-tools/style.css build/proprietary-tools/ && cp src/comprehensive-benefits/style.css build/comprehensive-benefits/ && cp src/legacy/style.css build/legacy/
scripts.copy-save: cp src/proprietary-tools/save.js build/proprietary-tools/ && cp src/legacy/save.js build/legacy/ && cp src/comprehensive-benefits/save.js build/comprehensive-benefits/
scripts.js:copy: cp src/proprietary-tools/view.js build/proprietary-tools/ && cp src/legacy/view.js build/legacy/
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rsync -av --exclude='src' --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='.git' --exclude='dist' --exclude='*.log' --exclude='package*' --exclude='*.md' --exclude='*.sh' ./ ./dist/real-assignment/ && cd dist && zip -r real-assignment.zip real-assignment
